类 CalendarManager

java.lang.Object
  data.CalendarManager

public class CalendarManager
extends java.lang.Object

实现日程类的各种底层操作

Administrator

构造方法详细信息

CalendarManager

public CalendarManager()
方法详细信息

checkSchedulePool

public static void checkSchedulePool()
This method is used to make sure the schedulePool not null. you should call this after you load your records from your file.

addNewSchedule

public static void addNewSchedule(Schedule s)
You use this method to insert a new Schedule into your schedulePool

参数：
s - the schedule you want to insert

getScheduleByDateAndIndex

public static Schedule getScheduleByDateAndIndex(java.util.Date date,
                                                 int index)
If you want to modify a schedule, you should find it first. You can use this method to find the schedule for the special date and index.

参数：
allTags - the date of the schedule you want to modify.
index - the index of the schedule you want to modify
返回：
null for error or schedule not found, you should check the return value of this method.

deleteScheduleByDateAndIndex

public static void deleteScheduleByDateAndIndex(java.util.Date selectedDate,
                                                int index)
You use this method to delete your schedules and you just need to pass the date, and the index of the schedule you want to delete to the method

参数：
selectedDate - the date of the schedule you want to delete
index - the index of the schedule you want to delete.

loadRecordsFromFile

public static void loadRecordsFromFile()
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
You should call this method at the beginning of your program. This Method is used to load your stored schedules from file. After you call this method, you should make sure the variable "schedulePool" is not null by calling the method checkSchedulePool(). This will only happen the first time you run your program, or the storage file is deleted. You should implement the method yourselves.

抛出：
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.lang.InterruptedException

saveRecordsToFile

public static void saveRecordsToFile()
                              throws java.io.IOException
This method is to save your records(schedules) into file. You should call this method every time you made change on your "schedulePool". You should implement the method yourselves.

抛出：
java.io.IOException

deSerialize

public static void deSerialize(java.io.FileInputStream fReader)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
This method is used to load records that stored in the file into memory. You just need to pass a file input stream as an arugments to it, and this method will load all the records into schedulePool.

参数：
fReader - the file input stream you need to pass as an argument.
抛出：
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

Serialize

public static void Serialize(java.io.FileOutputStream fWriter)
                      throws java.io.IOException
This method is fully implemented, and it is used to save objects into files. All you want to do is to pass a file output stream of your storage file to it.

参数：
fWriter - the file out put stream you need to pass as an argument.
抛出：
java.io.IOException
